metadata.description: AI detection and text humanization skills for Claude Code. Detect AI-generated content and transform it into natural human writing that bypasses GPTZero, Turnitin, and other AI detectors.

plugins.name: detect-ai
plugins.description: Analyze text to detect if it was written by AI. Returns a score from 0-100 with detailed metrics.

plugins.name: humanize
plugins.description: Transform AI-generated text into natural human writing that bypasses AI detectors.
